resources.string: [p]In this area you can play around with Admidio and see if the features of the program to fit your needs.[/p][p]We have also provided a couple of test data, so you can see in the individual modules, how this could look on your page later. You are welcome to play with this installation.[/p][p]We have created a few test accounts with different rights:[/p][p][span style="color:#008080;"][strong]Webmaster[/strong][/span][/p][table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;"][tbody][tr][td]Username:[/td][td][strong]Admin[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Password:[/td][td][strong]Admidio[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Rights:[/td][td]Can see and edit everything. More rights are not possible :)[/td][/tr][/tbody][/table][p][span style="color:#008080;"][strong]Chairman[/strong][/span][/p][table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;"][tbody][tr][td]Username:[/td][td][strong]Chairman[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Password:[/td][td][strong]Admidio[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Rights:[/td][td]Can edit and view everything, except assigning roles and changing program/module settings.[/td][/tr][/tbody][/table][p][span style="color:#008080;"][strong]Member[/strong][/span][/p][table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;"][tbody][tr][td]Username:[/td][td][strong]Member[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Password:[/td][td][strong]Admidio[/strong][/td][/tr][tr][td]Rechte:[/td][td]Can edit his profile and view lists of roles, where he is a member.[/td][/tr][/tbody][/table][p]Have fun trying ![br /]The Admidio Team[/p]
Starting next season, there are new jerseys for all active players. These can be picked up before the first training at the trainer.
During the holidays we offer a [i]aerobic course[/i] to all interested members.\n\nRegistrations are accepted on our [b]homepage[/b] or in our [b]office[/b].
Today we will put the focus on physical fitness and stamina.\n\nPlease appear all in time with running shoes on the sports field!
Today we have our barbecue. In addition to crisp sausages, chops and bacon, there are also various salads.
A four-day training course for youth coaches from the tennis department :)
The focus of this course lies with the Office products.
On this hopefully sunny day it goes to Amsterdam.\n\nA canal cruise and a shopping trip are planned.

Welcome to the guestbook of the demo area.

Here you can play around and test the capabilities of Admidio.

We hope you enjoy it and that we can convince you of this great program.
Then I'm going to look at the program.

For more information about the program look in the [a href="http://www.admidio.org/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=de:2.0:index"]documentation[/a].\n\nFor questions and suggestions just visit our [a href="http://forum.admidio.org"]forum[/a].
On this site there's not much news :(
The homepage of the [b]best[/b] open source membership management in the net.

The forum for the online membership management software. Here get's everyone support, who has encountered a problem while installing or setting up Admidio. But also suggestions and tips can be posted here.
The documentation for Admidio with valuable help and tips.
Any member may enter his favorite color
In this room meetings can take place. The room must be reserved in advance. A projector is available.
The function room can be used for birthday parties, annual meetings or party's. Advance booking is desirable.
